content.detailedDescription: Right after the sun set - driving west, glanced up into western sky - one bright star was in the sky - sky was getting dark, sun had gone down a few moments before, saw a bright (brighter than star) white cigar-shaped almost like looking at an airplane wing head on - it was at a 30 degree angle in the sky and much larger than the star.  i looked back down then glanced back up again and it very quickly it shrunk in size (same size as star) and disapeared quickly.  when i first saw it i thought it was a comet.   the reason i noticed it was because of its shape and brightness.  my reaction was amazement.  my brother and i were going somewhere and i pointed it out to him so he saw it too.
content.summary: Riding in car - saw off in distance

content.detailedDescription:
Last friday, on the evening of july 13, 2007, after work, while i was driving home west bound on i-96, at around 11:00pm, as i was unwinding to some light jazz on the radio, i noticed what i thought was venus as it really stood out against the stars. it was very, very bright, more so than any other night. for some reason i kept watching it as i continued on i-96 heading home. something about it just seemed odd. i can���t specifically say what was odd about it, only that my feeling was it was not as it seemed. traffic was very light at this time so i was able to concentrate more on the light as i was driving. after a little time of watching it, by the time i crossed over the bridge (grand river underneath i-96), i noticed this bright white light was not venus, but was actually moving at a steady pace across the night sky heading north. ok i thought, it���s got to be a plane, but then i thought how could this be a plane, it was too darn bright. so i kept watching, waiting and watching for the blinking lights to verify that this was in fact a plane, but there were none. no blinking lights anywhere. it was a solid bright white. now, as i am getting closer to it, or it to me, it moves across i-96 in front of me still heading north, but now has changed shape slightly into an oblong, bright white light. as i���m watching this i���m still looking for the blinking lights to verify this was a plane, although it in no way resembled what a plane looks like at night. as i get closer yet, just rounding the curve at granger landfill, heading to yet another bridge that runs over i-96 i can still see it, but it���s now way to the right of my windshield and is getting bigger in size, and lower in the sky. after maybe five seconds of staring at it i had to look out my passenger window because it was no longer visible through my windshield. at this point i was now looking out my passenger window at this v-shaped solid white light. that���s all it was���a solid, bright white v. no blinking lights, no strobes, no breaks or circles of lights, it was a solid bright white flying v in the night sky. i was in disbelief watching this until i nearly ran off the road, the rumble strips brining my attention back to my driving. i then did a quick check in my rear view mirror and looked to the lane next to me for cars and there were a few. a spurt of traffic had caught up to me as i was now only doing 45mph. when i looked over again out my passenger side window, after passing underneath the bridge, the trees blocked my view and i could no longer see the v. i immediately phoned a friend of mine who lives in the area this thing was heading. she answered the phone very keyed-up and told me before i could say anything that something huge just passed over, next to her house. needless to say i told her what i had just seen and we both were on the phone as i now took my exit ramp, then made my way over to her home searching for this thing. i took a couple of side roads, drove by her house, and then drove around the country roads, but it was gone. soon after i returned home, which was now around 11:40pm she hung up with me to call the airport to ask them about air traffic and if there was anything in the area around the time i had seen this, and the time it passed near her home. the person she spoke with in the control tower said at that time they had noticed nothing on radar and then even asked the person a chair over who also said they had seen nothing on radar. this person said that it wouldn���t be until next week before they would be able to have any more information because it was a friday night. they said they would check the radar returns over the weekend and the person she needed to talk with would be in next week. as soon as i get this information i will report their findings. 

thanks

update:  as i was getting ready to file this report today my friend called to let me know she had spoke with the faa at the airport. the man said there was nothing there. no one had left him any messages on any of this and that was it. he offered no help of any kind.
content.summary: Flying v

content.detailedDescription: My wife and i stopped to take some pictures of the sam houston statue near houston, texas. the two pictures submitted were taken 6 seconds apart. the small cloud looking object disapears and leaves a void in the clouds.
content.summary: Two pictures were talken 6 seconds apart. cloud looking object dispears.

content.detailedDescription:
At the time, i was in my bedroom, looking out of the window, facing north. i was trying to spot some lightning, because it was stormy, and the storm was almost directly above us. i spotted a fireball in the sky. it was just hovering there. then it went out, and a second, brighter one appeared. after a short while, the first reapppeared. they quickly vannished though.
when i first saw them, i took a video on my sony ericcson w300i phone, which i attached to this. i stopped recording when the fireballs disappeared.
content.summary: A fireball

content.detailedDescription: I was taking a nightly walk throughout the town of moscow, id listening to music on my mp3 player and as i was coming up the street to my apartment i looked up to the east (bearing of 50 degrees, approx 35 degrees elevation) and saw what i thought at first to be a bright star, however there were no stars (or planets) that were that bright in that sector of the sky. the light then got brighter for a moment and then started moving in a u type curve higher into the sky and began to get dimmer. shortly thereafter i lost track of the object. shortly thereafter i sprinted to my apartment to grab my camera, but by the time i got back outside i could not find the object again after about 30 minutes of searching the sky. the sky is also hazy in this area at this time of year due to dust which did not help in tracking the object.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Bright yellow moving light in the night sky

content.detailedDescription:
Todays date:  7/17/2007,  my name is  ruben  sierra, male hispanic, former united states  marine,  this instant case was  first  investigated  by  the late  dr. j. allen hynek,  founder of (cufos) center for the studies of ufos, who in turn, gave the  case to the late, idabell epperson, director mufon southern california, & her daughter marylin epperson, both field investigators for mufon. i ruben first sighted the ufo hoverning near our government housing project apartment unit, which was near a hilly area, the ufo then floated over the service drive, at which point i  brought it to the attention of my older brother, & 2 male cousins, one older & one the same age as myself.
     i was 6 years old at this ufo encounter, the ufo then came to rest at the base of the hansen dam, built by the army corps of engineers, a federal body, as was the federal housing project were this all took place (emphasis added!) the community at this time and place called this location a ufo landing base, and i feel the community was built for the purpose of studying ufos and working hand in hand, with them.  moreover, it should be noticed that the los angeles unified school district built a school for this government housing unit which is very odd to say the least!
     the ufo while over the service drive came to a complete hault in the air, my brother and 2 cousins, and other children waved at the craft an the crafts occupants return the wave back to us.  the ufo/craft the flew over the playground area, an came to rest at a 45 degree angle at the foot of the hansen dam. my brother & cousins, & other children followed the ufo to the dams base, where all became afraid and returned to the housing units, but i ruben remained at the crafts landed sight, as the craft was at a 45 degree angle, i approached it, an remember the smell of something similar to battery acid!? i remember walking on the gravel of the dams base, an placed one knee on the lowest point of the ufo which was at a 45 degree angle, and i crawled the circunference of the ufo, until i was at the opposite site of the craft, and i saw a small opening, where i saw beautiful lights of magenta, red, blues, yellowa, pink, and gold, lights, which seem to draw me to them, (emphasis added!)
     i fell downward into the craft, an have screen memory which was brought out under hypnoist, after i came out of the craft i return to the housing units where the children were playing a game of (hide and seek), so i went into my apartment unit where i was in a state of confusion, as my mother was combing my sister hair, at which time i asked my mother if my sister was chinesse, being my family is hispanic, mexican american, i was in a state of confusion. moreover, at this time my mother sent me to my room as she was agitated with me for not reconizing my sister, i asked my mother if my sister was chinesse, as in elongated eyes, i believe from my experience in the craft i have no other explaination! other than the alien beings had wrapped around elongated eyes!
     after i went to my bedroom, i sat in my red sofa chair, at which time i levitated upward to  the ceiling, and i felt the curtain rods, the ceiling light bulbs, as my feet dangled downward, i then floated downward to the red sofa, an came to rest on it.  i told my mother what transpired in the bedroom and she said you need a plane ticket to fly, an became more agitated and sent me outside to play with the other children.
     the children were playing hide and seek, an as i was late coming to the game, i had to seek them out, i was instructed to count backwards from a 100 at a light post, at which time i feel into a stupor, at about 75 count, when i awoke i found myself at the roof of the 3 story apartment units, and i found the children one at a time in this method of some how levitating to the 3 story apartment roof top, hearing where the children were hiding and levitating downward until i stood in front of the children, at which point the children became afraid, saying how did he do that, i don't want to play anymore!
     by this time it was now dark outside, and the adults were outside caring for the children, i remember a man pitching a baseball into the sky and catching the ball with his glove, it had to be a full moon as i could see the ball as he caught the ball, on his third toss, i glanced upward, and saw a ufo the size of a basketball, follow  the baseball downward, then circle the housing unit at which time it shape shift to a giant ufo over lapping the roof tops of the 3 story apartment units, with the same colors of magenta, gold pink, etc. as in the day time sighting.
     at this point the adults took the children into the apartments, and i went into my aunt and uncles apartment, as my parents were grocery shopping. when my parents return they took us home, an it was at this time i had my childhood ufo abductions, of abducting me from my bedroom apartment, and taking me to the same location of the base of the hansen dam, this transpired 3 times, and i told my parents, my mother then told me if i were to be taken into the craft again, as i reported to my parents of being seated in a chair in front of a large picture window, looking out into the blackness of space, and seeing millions of stars pass by at a great rate of speed, then the chair would shift into a different position, and the process would repeat itself.
     my mother got the idea of tearing the white bed sheets into strips, as she said if you fly tonight you'll take your brother, she then tied my hand and arm to my brothers hand and arm, and my leg to my brothers leg, an turned off the bedroom light. the childhood ufo abduction repeated itself again, at approx. 5:00 am my mother was making my fathers breakfast, and peeked into the bedroom, only to find the ufo aliens were not infalliable, as i was not tied to my brother but rather i was tied underneath, the bed itself, and my arm and legs were tied to the bedpost legs underneath the bed! (emphasis added!) submitted by,  ruben sierra, palmdale,  california.   7/17/2007
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: 1953, at  the  age of  6  years  old,  i  saw  a  ufo  hover  near  our  home, i  notified my  brother, & 2 male  cousins, the  ufo  came  to  rest at  the  foot of  the  hansen dam ,  where  i  was  abducted!

content.detailedDescription: Watchig  the  sky  with  binocculars  (as  i do  often  now  since  my  first  sighting  ) about  35  min.  later  i  see a  black ball / shpere with  a  plasma  like  light emitting  from  it . at  times  would get  intense , then  dim , at  times  would  go  out  to  black ,  but  still  visible. this lasted about  ten  to  twelve  min.  until  house blocked  my   view. i  stared  at  this "object" til  my arms  were  fatigued and  tears  stream  down  my  cheek from  holdind the  binocculars ! i  tried not to blink  or  make  a  move ,so  i  would'nt  lose  it.
content.summary: A' black ball' looking  object that  emitted  a  plasma  like  light at  times  would  get   intense to  dim in  a   sort  of  pulsing effect !

content.detailedDescription: I was on my way to a local store on an errand, as i usually do i take my digital camera with me (i recently took amateur photgraphy) on the way there i was snapping photos of the area as it looks at night for an online photo album. as i came home i had my attention diverted to the sky and there i saw a triangular shaped object silenty going along. the lights on it were very visable and since there was a little bit of light still in the sky you could make out a very dull black color. i took pictures of the object and will include them if requested. this is not the first time i have seen this object, but have kept it to myself, although this is the first time i have had the chance to take pictures of the object.
content.summary: Saw a triangular shaped object fly past in a east to west direction

content.detailedDescription: I was 10 years old at the time and i was playing in the backyard.  all of a sudden i got this creepy feeling that someone was watching me.  i looked around and spotted a large disc-shaped ufo hovering about 6 feet above our one-car garage.  its width was about the same as the length of the garage.  the object was black and silver, but i can't recall if the top or bottom was silver.  also, one of the halves was rotating slowly, but i can't recall which one.  although the object was hovering in place, it did so in a kind of unsteady manner.  i was about 30-40 feet away from it as i watched it.  i decided to run upstairs and tell my parents, but when they got to the window, the object was gone.
content.summary: Daylight disk sighted in garfield, n.J.

content.detailedDescription:
I first noticed this object while running errands with my husband. it glowed and did not really seem to fit - as it was very noticeable and hung low in the sky.  i kept an eye on it as we traveled home.  it did not move, did not grow dimmer or brighter.  at first i thought it was a planet/star.  however, when we arrived home, it had not moved downward towards the horizon.  around 10 p.M., i was speaking to a friend on the phone, on the front porch, facing west.  i looked for the object and it was moving northeast.  it was pulsating, moving slowly at a rather low altitude.  it came by the house and i lost sight of it at that time.

it resembled two other objects i had seen a month or so ago.  there were two of them, one in the southeast and the other in the west.  they were round, glowed an orange color and moved slowly.  my attention was drawn to them due to the "firefly lights".  there were about five or six objects, i could not see the shape, that were flying from the north towards the object.  they resembled fire flies, flashing a brilliant white light and moving rapidly.  they seemed to converge on the object.  the object then began "floating" towards the west.  i followed as it moved and ran through the house to the front - facing west.  at that time, i spotted a second orange glowing object some distance from the first, "floating" west.  once again i noticed the "firefly" lights that seemed to be following it. i watched until they disappeared. 

 i do not know exactly what i saw, but as we live near an air force base, it could have possibly been some sort of research craft.  however, that does not explain the jets that seemed to be "chasing" the objects on both occasions.  both of the incidents happened after sunset.
content.summary: Orange sphere traveling from west to east

content.detailedDescription: At about 4pm my wife and i were traveling south east bound on i-24 between exit 89 in ky and exit 1 in tn observed a small black sphere the size of a basketball between 50-100 feet above the ground and only 100 feet to the right side of the interstate. i am surprised i even saw the object as it was small and somewhat close to trees. the sphere had a small ring around the middle, but tilted about 45 degrees from the horizon. only visible for about one minute as i could not slow down. continued to observe in side and rear window. it slowly gained altitude but i lost it because of trees, a small hill and then by it's distance away. would not have reported it except i read the recent md report and it appears to be identical to what i saw. i am a retired army helicopter instructor pilot with 23 years of flying experience. this object was not a balloon, or a power line obstacle marker (those are orange) and just to make sure i went back to the exact spot and there are no power lines or houses, only heavy forested area.
content.summary: Small black sphere near i-24 1 mile from tn/ky border

content.detailedDescription: I was driving down padonia road south bound toward i-83 and on my left side i saw a black sphere hovering over power lines. i thought it was a balloon but when i sized it up and thought about what i was seeing it looked 4-5 times the size���more like the size of a child���s bouncy ball approximately 50-100 feet in the air. i stopped my car in the middle of the road to observe the object. it hung there in the air. i watched it for about 15 seconds. i had to move my car as traffic came around the corner and forced me to move. i made an immediate u turn in the road and went back. the object was gone. i turn down the next road next to the power lines so i was able to get behind the road where i was to get another view and could not see the object. i did notice a man who was watching me the whole time. he was standing directly below where the object was hovering. i was talking to my wife when i saw the object and told her i had to go because i saw a black sphere. i told her i would call her back because i had to make a u turn because traffic made me move forward. the man who watched me stopped in the road watched me after i u turned and after i can back from behind the road. i wanted to stop and ask him if he saw the object on the 3rd pass but the traffic again forced me on my way. i debated writing in but i can not get this off my mind.
content.summary: Black sphere

content.detailedDescription: I was standing outside at my home talking on the phone to a friend describing a previous sighting when i saw a bright orange light hovering about 35 to 40 degrees off the ground.  i didn't know what it was, i knew it wasn't a plane, helicopter, or street light.  it was to high to be street light, there was no sound or blinking lights.  it just hovered with no sound.  i was curious about it and kind of excited that i had seen two ufos in one night.  i lost sight of it when i went inside to eat before my food got cold.  the weather was clear.  the object didn't move, make sounds, or have any blinking lights.  when i went outside an hour later it was gone.
content.summary: A bright orange light.

content.detailedDescription: I was at home grilling steaks, when i went outside to take my steak off the grill.  something told me to look up at the sky, i saw a bright white light flying at high altitude and high speed.  at first i tought it was a plane but then then it dimmed to a barely visible blue light. it never changed speed, altitude, or direction during this time.  i then noticed a second dim blue light heading in the opposite direction.  both lights were flying at the same speed and altitude.  both lights flew in a straight line.  neither light had any blinking lights on them and there was no sound.  the weather was clear.  i wasn't scared or anything i was more curious then anything.  i lost sight of them when they flew out of my sight range.
content.summary: A sighting of 2 lights at night

content.detailedDescription: Taking pictures of jet planes,lunch time at work.When i got home,black dots are in the pictures.I magnified the black dots on my pc ... look like ufos to me.
content.summary: Black  dots in sky

content.detailedDescription: I was lying down with a friend admiring the stars that evening.  it was a perfectly clear night in santa cruz and the stars looked fantastic.  i have been gazing up into the stars for many years and have seen my share of meteorites, meteors, and satellites.  we both noticed a rather bright star that appeared be moving at a consistent velocit y across the sky.  its brightness appeared to be about equal to that of the brightest object in the sky that evening, most likely some planet.  however, this moving object quickly faded out and disappeared.  i have never seen any sattelite do anything like this before.  about 15 mins later i indentified what i thought was a sattelite combing across the sky.  again, the object (slightly less  bright than the previous), appeared to move at a constant velocity and we were able to watch it as i moved several degrees across the sky.  all the sudden, the object instantly disappeared.  once again, the sky was completely clear that evening and it is not possible that any clouds could have obstructed our view.  we were unable to see the object further down its trajectory at a later time as well.  after thinking about these sightings in great detail, i cannot fully explain what i saw, the objects moved too slowly to be any sort of meteor or smaller.  it could be possible that we viewed some military missile testing, but i do not know of any way of checking their schedule.  this could be a possible explanation.
content.summary: Disappearing moving lights in the sky
Early morning sighting of stationary ufo in burlington, vt area...

content.detailedDescription: On the night of( cant remember possibly 1983,or 84? 11 pm or so oct. or nov.? )after picking up a fare i was traveling on i91 north toward the north haven/new haven exit to go to (eastern circle; housing complex)to drop off my fare when i saw below my cab visor on the left side of the font windshield a reddish light in the sky an and strange outlined shape sort of a baseball diamond shape elongated. there was no moon out but just the light over the highway. i deceided to pull over before the exit and told the passenger to see this (***?)thing in the sky. we both exited the cab and looking up about 1,000 feet or so (hard to tell distance in the dark but using aprox. distance close as possibly could figure it at 800 to 1,200 ft. above the highway) the object was traveling slowly away over the highway at a slow rate of speed with no noise? i thought it was a blimp but when it crossed the highway it picked up speed and started to travel faster and then bolted so fast it left a white line in the sky (no noise again!!!) well i was scare! and confused!, as was my passenger!  i,ve told twelve people i,ve trusted in the last 23 to 24 years and told them i was not happy with any of their responses. so i shut my mouth, but it still happened and i know they exist now. what ever made this craft is so advanced there will be no way that you or me or anyone will really prove their existance. enough said!
content.summary: Bigger than a baseball diamond or a football field. traveling  slow at first  with no noise

content.detailedDescription:
Driving to work a bright object caught my eye a few inches above the treeline but definitely a couple miles away.
tried to follow it with eyes while staying on road but lost visual after a minute, due to treeline.
about 1 minute later i noticed a pair of fighter jets in formation, flying at very low altitude, and they appeared to zoom in the direction of where the ufo had appeared to be heading (towards the ocean).
content.summary: Very reflective object heading north to south

content.detailedDescription:
I was outside in my garage playing acoustic guitar until around approximately 3:40 am, and i decided to go inside because i'd finally wore myself out. i walked outside and happened to glance acorss the street above my neighbor's house. my eye caught upon something i thought was a very bright star... but there were two problems. one problem was that sirius, which usually appears in that direction, was never ever as bright or large as this object had been,and two was that it was wobbling in a loopy sort of fashion. it was not staying still in the sky. i  thought maybe i was swaying because i was tired, so i sat down and observed it for a little while, and it was still wobbling and swaying, like i was looking at a super bright star drunk out of my mind or something. i decided to walk out into the street to get a better ;ook at it, and as i passed the tree at the end of my driveway, i happened to glance up through the edge of the tree and i saw yet another very bringht neon blue star-like object. i rushed out into the middle of the street, and pretty much as soon as i got a good look at this thing, it did the most amazing arial maneuver i'd ever seen. i went from being pretty much stationary to doing a quick spiraling motion, and then shot straight up into space towards a very small orange lightvery very high up in the sky. at that point, the orange light twinkled and disappeared, also. the other light was still hovering over my neighbor's house. it could've been there for an hour, 15 minutes, a whole day, i can't be sure because i went inside shortly after the second "craft" shot away up into space. i've seen a few other strange vehicles in the sky, but this sighting stick out the most because i actually saw full propulsion capabilities being used, whereas most of the other times, it was just hovering stationary or floating away slowly and disappearing.
there's a bit more to my story i wish not to discuss right now. thanks, bye.
content.summary: Two neon blue lights spotted above my neighborhood

content.detailedDescription:
I was about 12 years old at the time.  my friends and i were running across w. beecher st. into kosciuszko park to play tackle football.  at the time my address was 2058 s. 8 st.  milwaukee, wi.  there was a small open field just north of the entrance to the swimming pool where we played football.  kosciuszko park encompassed an area from 7th street on the east to 10th street on the west, and beecher street on the north to lincoln avenue on the south.  there are tennis courts to the west of the area where we played football.  one of my friends pointed up and said "hey look at that!"  moving from west to east was a rectangular object with rounded corners.  it had the deep grey color that stealth aircraft have today.  there was a low overcast cloudbase, probably 1000 ft.  i'd say it was half-way to it in altitude.  it was maybe 5 degrees to the south of us from being directly overhead.  it had no markings and went over in 5 to 10 seconds making no more sound than would come from a window fan. 

i have just recently gotten online and learned of your website from listening to coast to coast am, so i've had no way to report this until now.

please feel free to contact me at my e-mail or phone if you would like.

witt best regards.
content.summary: A rectangular shape

content.detailedDescription: I was at a church camp in darlington, maryland on sunday nite, july 8th, and was watching some local residents shoot off fireworks.  i noticed a large yellow-orange light in the sky, but passed it off as a star.  i went to do some camp activities and return no more than an hour later to where i had watched the fireworks and noticed thaat the light had moved to a different region in the sky.  i called a friend over to look and described to her what i have just written above.  we watched the light and saw it getting dimmer and dimmer until it disappeared from sight.  it was around some trees, but not behind any, as we could make out the outline of the treestops (the light did not seem to be close to the trees).  it quickly reappeared in the same spot and again dimmed and faded.  it then reappeared above another group of trees about a foot to the left (distance based on my reference, were i to point from one part of the sky to another; i do not know how large the object may have been and so cannot say how far to the left it actually moved).  the light was now more of an orange-red colour and appeared to be spinning counter-clockwise and possibly changing its basic shape (it remained a sphere, but i could see the edges changing).  we did not see the object move; it disappeared from one spot and reappeared in another.  the object slowly started to sink below the tree line; at this point we called over another observer to view the object.  eventually the object was below the tree line; however, the foliage was sparce and we could still partially see the object.  however, when i would change positions to get a better view, the object would move and "hide."  there was no wind to speak of that night, nor a breeze, and so the leaves were not swaying to cover the light.  for several minutes the light would move itself when i would move to better view it until eventually it fell behind where we could see.  overall, the incident took 45 minutes at the most.  possibly unrelatedly, the next morning i had a nosebleed; they are rare for me, but i was feeling a cold coming on.  it was most likely a coincidence.  unfortunately, the light did not return any subsequent night.  the other witnesses and i were definately freaked out; not scared, but curious as to what we were watching before us.  on a final note, i was told the morning after the sighting that the harford county, maryland newspaper, the aegis, had been reporting on ufo sightings in the recent weeks up to my own sighting.
content.summary: A large orange-red light that would dim and disappear, move, and "hide" behind trees

content.detailedDescription: July 15th, 2007, 4:30 am california time: witnessed a large bright light traveling north in a straight line, eventually fading from view behind mountain range in north west san bernardino. object looked like a very bright star, but brighter than all the other stars. extremly bright. traveled silently as fast as a jet, but slower than a falling star. it was higher than air traffic in this area, but lower than the stars. pace was constant and trajectory was smooth with no deviation. no trail. i had woken up from a dream involving the mountains and went outside to journal my dream. i had been looking at the night sky (dusting of clouds and stars) and then began writing. the star i had noticed a moment before started moving as described. i was startled and thought, "oh, that wasn't a star, but how did i miss that?". then i just watched it thinking, "i've never seen a plane move in that direction, nor travel in that direction." i strained to listen for sound, but it was completely silent. i thought it was a ufo.
content.summary: Bright noiseless light traveling north

content.detailedDescription:
I want to report an unidentified aerial phenomenon. on june 30,07 i witnessed along with a friend a very strange light emanating from a cloud near my house in vaudreuil,quebec within a few kms from montreal. 

first let me start by saying i am very experienced with auroras (been tracking them for years) i am also an amateur astronomer, i have experience with aircraft and flight and have a sound knowledge of weather. what i saw along with my friend that night i cannot explain.I ruled out lights from a plane,fireworks,auroras,lightning and static discharge.

it was around 11:30 pm, we just finished looking at the moon through my telescope and i was looking out at the night sky when i saw this cloud southeast from my home,it looked close and had just been over the house so i know it was a low cloud by the speed it was travelling.I thought it was pretty against the light of the almost full moon. all of a sudden, the cloud turned red with a little orange tint then pulsed to blue and then changed to green. it lit up the whole cloud telling me that whatever was creating this light was big. the light lasted about 4 seconds and turned off. i then yelled to my friend to come see what i just saw and miraculously the light re-appeared just in time for her to see it. the second view also lasted about 4 seconds and pulsed from red with orange tint to blue to green almost mechanically. having seen it twice and having the same light pattern rules out a natural phenomenon.

i have been pondering coming forward for awhile now but decided it was the right thing to do.
content.summary: Vaudreuil quebec  strange colored lights emenating from a low cloud

content.detailedDescription:
I'm a photographer, and take quite alot of storm pictures, and sunset pictures etc. i've been doing this for the last 30 years. on july 10, 2007,about 9:25 pm, i was taking sunset pictures from my deck. i was facing west, and there was a cloud. the sun was down on the horizon behind the cloud. i took 10 to 15 shots. i came in and put the camera down. i was using my digital. i watched tv for about 2 hours, and decided to look at the pictures before i went to bed, to see if i got anything worth keeping. i wondered what in the world that big white spot was on one of the pictures. i loaded the pictures in my computer, so i could crop and zoom in on the subject. i also used a solarizing technique on it too. i'm going to try to send the picture on here so you can see it. i do not remember seeing the object as i was taking the picture. it must have went in and out real fast. i also have a picture (the one right before the white light)
that shows a little faint spot that might be the same thing behind the cloud, but that is very questionable. it was midnight when i found the light on the picture, and didn't go to bed till 2am, and then couldn't sleep at all. i had a sighting on may 24th, which i posted on here, and this light, looked to be the same thing i saw before, but alot closer. the other sighting, was at meijers in kokomo. when i see the picture, i just can't believe i didn't see it through the viewfinder on the camera at the time i took it. it's so obvious. it's just weird, to see something two different times in like 6 weeks. now it's kind of taking up alot of my time, because i keep looking west at the same time every night, and have a feeling of being watched. i spend alot of time now researching, that i didn't do before. anyway i hope this picture goes through for you to see.
if anyone has a good explaination, i'd love to hear it!
content.summary: I was taking sunset pictures, and got something else  i hadn't planned on.

content.detailedDescription:
I was sitting in the meijers parking lot in kokomo, on may 24th. i was talking on my cell phone, facing west. it was about 9:25pm. i was looking at venus, and it wasn't quite dark yet, and a little cloud cover. all of a sudden a bright light appeared below venus...Then it shot straight above venus. then 5 bright light appeared in a diagnial line to the right of venus and the first light. i just knew it couldn't be planes or helicoptors, balloons etc. i'm a photographer, and dropped the phone, and grabbed my camera. by the time i got out of the car, they had dissapeared. 
so i didn't get a picture at all. i had hung up on my girlfriend, and when i called her back, i had to leave her a message on what happened. she got a kick out of it, and i think she still has my message on her phone. which also has the exact time. i just had another experience on july 10th, which i will submit next. i have a picture on that one that i took in tipton co.
content.summary: May 24th, 2007 in kokomo at meijers parking lot...6 bright lights in west sky by venus

content.detailedDescription:
Vi un objeto negro en forma de estrella que cruzaba el cielo a eso de las 7 pm del dia 14 de julio,despues de observarlo un rato y tomarle video,otro objeto mas se le hacerco y desaparecieron el el orizonte.
su forma era perfecta de una estrella de 5 picos y giraba incoherente lo unico es que en el video no se aprecia bien por ser de muy bajos pixel mi camara y no tener suficiente zoon.
content.summary: Objeto negro en forma de estrella

content.detailedDescription: I was on the conference with my friends arguing with someone who hacked into my name and claimed to be an entity which i���ve dealt with in various abduction scenarios.  yes i���ve experienced abducted which i now term ���contacts��� with the entity.  i have the instant message saved to my computer from that night.  the instant message is full of death threats from the hacker so i���m not comfortable with sending the file at this time.  after i was done with the conference i had a bad feeling about something and went to open my side door of my room.  i looked up in amazement to see something i never thought would be over my house.  i saw a hexagon shaped formation of six tiny white lights.  it just staid there for about a minute or two and the lights went out one by one.  it had to be the same craft i���ve seen and one of my friends had seen.  me and my friends feel this hexagon craft is dangerous because of other contacts with similar objects.  we think its 500 feet wide and about 200 tall.  it���s very reflective and appears only because it has lights.  after i saw the last light vanish i stared at the same stop for another few minutes to make sure it wasn���t still there.  i didn���t get pictures this time but i do have old ones of the same craft that are much better than what i would have gotten if i did take pictures.
content.summary: The object which is becoming familiar became visible out of nowhere.

content.detailedDescription:
When i was about 18 yrs old i was living in colombia, some friends and i had always been very into metaphysics and all subjects related to the power of the mind.

we, as probably every person in the world had wonder about life in other planets and the idea of contacting them and we wanted to get facts that might solve some questions.

we ( 3 friends and i ) went on an a flat roof of a house laid down drawing a circle with our bodies and joining hands formed a complete circle. we began to meditate talking in our minds in a complete calm state to any being that might get our message, asking them to contact us or give us a signal. after about 15 minutes of doing this one of my friends said out loud "we will open our eyes on the count of 3, signal us, signal us, signal us" we counted to 3 and then a second went by; i was thinking well that was a waste of time hehehhe and before that thought in my mind was finish we all saw in the sky "3 shooting stars" one after the other in the same spot on the sky.  i am no specialist in stars or anything like that but that was what it look like to our eyes.

i share this story with you hopping that my experience my inspire some one else to do the same and perhaps achieve more or something different.
content.summary: Signaled when meditating

content.detailedDescription:
We were sitting on our front lawn facing southeast saw object in sky and thought it was a plane but was moving to slow.  off to the east of object there was a plane that went south and left the salt lake valley.  object slowing moving south and turned towards the oquirrah mountains to the west.  we watched the object with binoculars and the object looked like it was rotating on both ends.  three people watched the object that could be seen with the naked eye, watched with binoculars to try and see what it was.  it left us with a wondering of what it was. called the local news to see if anyone else had reported strange object in the sky and was referred to our local airport who referred us to this web sight.
 the object moved out of our sight to the west towards the oquirrah mountians.
content.summary: Shaped like a barbell with oval ends
